title: ISic020703. ISic020703
body:
1Νεδαι

1Nedai

1ΝΕΔΑΙ

1NEDAI

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Sudano 2015

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

The inscription may correspond to the form without nu of the term Νενδας, very common in the inscriptions of the indigenous Sicily (see Sudano 2015, 702, note 16 and, e.g. the inscription from Sciri ISic003362, and the two Ionic kylikes from Castiglione di Ragusa ISic020698 and ISic020699). Νενδας has been interpreted as theonym by Manganaro 2003, 149, then as a word part of a funerary votive formula by Agostiniani, Prosdocimi 1976-1977, 229-230 (it often occurs in inscriptions on vessels from grave goods). The current interpretation is that it is an indigenous anthroponym (Agostiniani-Cordano 2002, 83-85).

bibliography

  • Sudano 2015 702, no. 3, fig. 9 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002382
  • Agostiniani, Cordano 2002 83-85 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002381
  • Camera 2020 153, fig. 7.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002379
  • Camera 2010 47, 115-116 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002377
